callToAction: NSLOCTEXT("", "093B06A44C4E2DE5899D33AB7BE369FD", "Help the Piper collect the plunder from the Mercenary Coffers.")
description: NSLOCTEXT("", "AEFC33A34B19A5D543213A84FF52E6C3", "The Piper doesn\'t care about ancient evils. With the appearance of haunts in the citadel, the mercenaries are in a frenzy. Such chaos provides a window of opportunity! He wants to collect the plunder of the Sons of Fortune and cut and run! He has promised a generous portion of the treasures that can be hauled from Citadel of Steel Bloom to anyone that aids in the heist. It may not be the honorable thing to do, but it is quite promising.")
name: MAQ_0007_WOO_WindowOfOpportunity
